description.value:
You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Premonition Of Avoidance], allies within 15 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Shared Avoidance]
